item_body.text:
Suspicious financial activities include:

  • Foreign currency transactions shortly followed by fund transfers to high-risk locations.
  • Sudden settlement of debts by unrelated third parties.
  • Numerous email transfers between the client and unrelated third parties.
  • Multiple variations of name, address, phone number, or additional identifiers in account documents.
  • Indication of a planned end date to account activity.
